file_content.text: Hello, patriot. I hope you remain dedicated to the protection of the true Republic.
There you are. I was beginning to worry Senate security was causing you trouble.
How did it go? Did you get Parvil's documents?
There was a complication--a Senate page found me.
I was spotted.
It doesn't matter. So long as you have the evidence we need.
It went smooth as silk.
No problem.
Good. That's the way we like it.
It wasn't easy, but I got them.
Barely.
I'm glad you pulled it off. You deserve a medal for this, you know.
Do you have my reward?
Here. You take your price and I'll take the parcel. Rest easy knowing Senator Parvil's motion will never pass.
My pleasure.
You're a hero to the true Republic. We won't forget what you've done.
That was a one-time deal.
I'm done with you and your cause.
Good riddance.
Whether you're proud of it or not, you are a hero of the true Republic.
Why are you hanging around here? Find the messenger droid in the Senate tower and get that parcel.
Master Jedi--come look. It's the Senate tower.
It's fantastic, isn't it? The Senate tower--every officer should see it sooner or later.
It's fantastic, isn't it? I mean the Senate tower.
I was raised there. My father was an admiral and my mother was a Senator, but they were both killed during the war.
That's tragic. I'm sorry to hear it.
My condolences.
Don't be. They gave their lives to protect this great Republic.
People die.
I know. And they died for a cause. They died for the Republic.
What are you babbling about?
I'm sorry--my name is Spirakris Zarem. I used to be military, then a diplomat. But not anymore.
Now, I represent a group of loyal citizens, willing to go to any length to protect the true Republic from its enemies.
What exactly is the "true Republic"?
The "true Republic"?
The true Republic is the one based on ideals--on the principles that carried us through history. Until now.
What does this have to do with me?
So?
A disaster is unfolding and we need help to stop it.
Hmm, I dunno....
I won't lie to you. The members of my organization prefer to remain anonymous, but we are patriots from all levels of society.
Dangerous radicals are about to make a massive power play in the Senate.
Senator Glearius Parvil is gathering support to break ties with the Jedi and establish an alliance with the Sith Empire.
Why would the Republic break ties with the Jedi?
For what reason?
Because your order would never agree to an alliance with the Empire, and that's what the Senator wants.
The dark side is always at work behind the scenes.
Evil never rests.
I agree, but Parvil actually believes he's trying to save the Republic.
Seems like everybody's jumping ship these days.
Traitors.
No doubt. First it was just some fringe star systems, but now it's happening a lot closer to home.
Can't say I'd want to worry about Imperial law enforcement....
Bad for business.
No. I imagine not, Captain. So I hope you can help.
Not good news.
That's fine.
I hope you're kidding. If the Senator gets his way, it would mean the end of everything the Republic stands for.
My colleagues discovered a way to expose Parvil's plan to the public; turn the political tide against this insanity.
But our one shot's about to pass us by. Parvil's put us all on Senate security's watch list. We can't even get near the tower.
Send me.
You said "your one shot." You have an idea....
What's your plan?
You mean you might actually be willing to help us?
Whatever.
Listen, I know this sounds desperate, but we are desperate. You could save the day.
A diplomatic parcel is being delivered to Senator Parvil's office. All you'd have to do is steal the parcel and smuggle it out to me. Will you do it?
Of course.
Thank the stars. Until you came along, I was beginning to give up hope.
My duty is to serve the Senators, not steal from them.
No, I'm a Jedi.
You'll be serving the Empire if Senator Parvil gets his way. You must stop him.
Jedi usually don't get involved in politics.
This doesn't seem right.
Jedi won't be involved in much of anything if Senator Parvil gets his way. We need your help.
This operation sounds a little too delicate for me.
Not my style.
We're handling the delicate part. We need someone like you to handle the action.
Sounds like a good way to get myself killed.
Too dangerous.
Not at all. We have a plan in place. The risk is minimal.
No way, no how.
I beg you to reconsider. You know the Senator must be stopped.
We can reward you for your help. I don't know if that changes anything...
I'm in.
Oh, in that case....
This means so much to us... and to the true Republic.
A courier droid is delivering the documents to Senator Parvil. Use this scrambler box and it'll hand the parcel to you.
Just intercept it before it reaches his office. I'll be waiting here.
My allegiance is not for sale.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
Very well. I can't argue with that. But it's a pity for Coruscant.
If you're loyal to the true Republic, talk to me later. I might need your help.
